TEXT: A living construct created for war, now awakened from a long slumber. NL Must release the energy building in his overcharging aetherheart or risk self-destruction.
NL The aetherheart runs wild, crackling with energy...

Navigating an unlit street, you come across several hooded figures in the midst of some dark ritual. As you approach, they turn to you in eerie unison. The tallest among them bares fanged teeth and extends a long, pale hand towards you. NL ~"Join~ ~us,~ ~construct,~ ~and~ ~feel~ ~the~ ~warmth~ ~of~ ~the~ ~Spire."~
